definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable id="extradamage" type="Number">extradamage</variable></variables><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">entity_attacked</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block inline="false" type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">AND</field><value name="A"><block type="item_is_enchanted"><value name="item"><block type="entity_iteminhand"><value
